data.news_body:
A copy of the 'Financial Highlights' of Coffee Day Enterprises Limited & Coffee Day Global Limited is attached herewith.

A copy of the statement of Standalone & Consolidated Audited financial results of the Company and the statement of Consolidated Audited financial results of its subsidiary, Coffee Day Global Limited along with the Independent Auditors' Report is attached herewith.

Statement on Impact of Audit Qualifications pursuant to Regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) (Amendment), 2016 & SEBI Circular No. CIR/CFD/CMD/56/2016.
